title._content: Image taken from page 244 of 'Voyages de la Commission Scientifique du Nord, en Scandinavie, en Laponie, au Spitzberg et aux Feröe, pendant les années 1838, 1839 et 1840, sur la Corvette La Recherche, commandée par M. Fabvre ... Publiés par ordre du G

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Voyages de la Commission Scientifique du Nord, en Scandinavie, en Laponie, au Spitzberg et aux Feröe, pendant les années 1838, 1839 et 1840, sur la Corvette La Recherche, commandée par M. Fabvre ... Publiés par ordre du Gouvernement sous la direction de M. P. G" Author: Gaimard, Paul Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10281.g.7-16." Volume: 14 Page: 244 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1842 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001350557 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Please note that you will need to enter details from the above list - such as the shelfmark, the page, the book's volume and so on - when filling out your order. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue. You will be able to download a PDF of the book this image is taken from, as well as view the pages up close with the 'itemViewer'. Click on the 'related items' to search for the electronic version of this work.
